mapper.update: update goods_post_recode set goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_his_id = #{goodsHisId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, post_status = #{postStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, export_time = #{exportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, goods_id, goods_his_id, customer_id, post_status, export_time, post_time, create_time, update_time from goods_post_recode where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
